mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.password as password, a.nickname as nickname, a.birthday as birthday, a.gender as gender, a.email as email, a.tel as tel FROM user_main a, user_address b, user_sub c WHERE a.id = b.id AND b.id = c.id AND a.id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into user_main (id, password, nickname, birthday, gender, email, tel) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel})
insert into user_address (id, postalCode, sido, sigungu, addr) values (#{id},#{postalCode}, #{sido}, #{sigungu}, #{addr})
